description: [Leadership] Live Your Dreams Africa Foundation (LYDA) has been awarded the 'Not-For-Profit of the Year 2024' at the 18th SERAS Africa Sustainability CSR Awards, recognising the organisation's ongoing efforts to empower young people and tackle unemployment in Africa.
title: Africa: Lyda Foundation Wins 'Not-for-Profit of the Year 2024' At Seras Africa Awards
